original_text: There were also some priests from the clans of Hobaiah, Hakkoz and Barzillai. (Barzillai was a man who had married a daughter of Barzillai, who came from Gilead. So he took Barzillai's name for himself.) There were also some priests from the clans of Hobaiah, Hakkoz and Barzillai. (Barzillai was a man who had married a daughter of Barzillai, who came from Gilead. So he took Barzillai's name for himself.) So he took Barzillai's name for himself.) There were also some priests from the clans of Hobaiah, Hakkoz and Barzillai. (Barzillai was a man who had married a daughter of Barzillai, who came from Gilead. So he took Barzillai's name for himself.)
korean_text: 제사장 중에는 호바야 자손과 학고스 자손과 바르실래 자손이니 바르실래는 길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸 중의 하나로 아내를 삼고 바르실래의 이름으로 불린 자라

sentences.original_text: There were also some priests
from the clans of Hobaiah, Hakkoz and Barzillai
Barzillai was a man
who had married a daughter of Barzillai
who came from Gilead
So he took Barzillai's name for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 바실래라는 이름을 자신으로 삼았다
